titleStmt.title: The praise of a pretty lasse: or, The young mans dissimulation: else hee would not disgrace a maiden in such fashion, to the tune of, Bank's game.

publicationStmt.publisher: By M.P. for F. Grove, neere the Sarazens Head with-out New-gate.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Young men and maidens, to you Ile declare ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
